reference.title: Document change log
reference.shortdesc: Changes to this document are listed in this topic.

li.p: Updated "Alarm Console Monitor" section in the "alarm-AlarmPortal" topic to include the Fox Over WebSocket feature.
Updated "alarm-AlarmPortal" plugin topic to include the changes in the Scheme column (as of ).
Added “alarm-NumericChangeOfStateAlarmExt” to the “Types of alarm extensions” section (as of Niagara 4.14).
Updated content in “Email Setup” topics.
Added “Setting Up Gmail Account for using Outgoing Email” topic to “Email Setup” chapter.
Added new “onCall Overview” chapter.
Added “HTML5- On Call List Manager” topic to “Plugins” chapter.
Added “Email Authenticator” properties to “IncomingAccount” and “OutgoingAccount” components under “EmailService” (as of ).
Added alarm extension “alarm-FloatLimitAlarmExt” and “alarm-BooleanCommandFailureAlarmExt” to “Types of alarm extensions” section. HTML5- On Call List Manager
Corrected steps in “Setting up a remote Orion alarm database” topic.
Edited description of properties of “email-IncomingAccount” and “email-OutgoingAccount“ topic.
Added description to the database property, updated image and minor changes in the “alarmOrion-OrionAlarmService” topic.
Correction in the “alarm-StatusAlarmExt” component topic.
Added content on the Alarm Archive feature.
Minor edit in the “alarm-StatusAlarmExt” component topic.
Minor correction in the “alarm-StringChangeOfValueAlarmExt” component topic.
Updated document to reflect changes in . Added information about AlarmOrion.
In the topic, alarm- AlarmSourceExt, updated the Alarm Inhibit property description for fault state.
In the topic, Alarm Database Maintenance view, updated the Alarm Transition property description for 4.3.
Initial release document.
